text: why don't women ever go for the nice guy
it's the age old question across movies

leaving you feeling better and more able
to make good relationships problem
victim complex remedy reassess how you
see failure nobody likes a guy with a
victim complex least of all women if
you've got it in your head that the
world is against you that nothing that

just so unfair and chances are that
you're not a great person to be around
this is another Hallmark of the nice guy
mentality they don't want to improve

something that goes with improving your

hating this kind of man the nice guy

you just have to back yourself problem
transactional kindness remedy the halo
effect one of the parts of the nice guy

is seeing kindness as transactional just

kind for the sake of it being genuine

living in the past and thinking they owe

Importance of Being genuinely kind and
